name: Shock Fitting
tagline: This will be a modular sock fitting code to be plugged to arbitrary CFD codes
body:
Welcome to the homepage of ShockFitting (work in progress ...).

This code is the result of the collaboration among

* [Renato Paciorri](http://www.dima.uniroma1.it/dima/node/5716) and Valentina De Amicis at University La Sapienza of Rome
* [Aldo Bonfiglioli](http://oldwww.unibas.it/utenti/bonfiglioli/www.html) at University of Basilicata
* [Andrea Lani] (https://www.vki.ac.be/index.php/departments/ar-department-other-menu-100/people-other-menu-99/265-research-engineers-and-engineers/388-andrea-lani) at the Von Karman INstitute for Fluid Dynamics
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
